text: Kibatalia wigmani is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae. It is a tree endemic to Sulawesi in Indonesia. It is a vulnerable species threatened by habitat loss. ==References== wigmani Category:Endemic flora of Sulawesi Category:Trees of Sulawesi Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Elmer Drew Merrill
title: Kibatalia wigmani
